title: Collection Description Scheme
description: A grouping of multiple ObjectGroups for a particular use case, purpose or implementation.

basisOfScheme.description: A summary of the basis or purpose for the CollectionDescriptionScheme.

isDistinctObjects.description: A flag to designate whether a physical object may be described by more than one ObjectGroup within the CollectionDescriptionScheme.

schemeName.description: A short descriptive name given to the CollectionDescriptionScheme.

hasSchemeTerm.description: One or more Scheme Terms incorporated in the Collection Description Scheme

hasSchemeMeasurementOrFact.description: One or more Scheme Measurement Or Facts incorporated in the Collection Description Scheme

hasIdentifier.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the Identifier class.

hasReference.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the Reference class.
